Subject: Re: [gladiator] team order
From: "James Trahern" <4idlamo@...>
X-Yahoo-Profile: zjackrum

The most obnoxious problem I discovered was my teammates inability to survive. The game is most fun on Battle, but I always played on slaughter. With my brothers and I jamming around the keyboard, we had one fighter, one cleric, and one mage. That was it.
The cleric built up a "base" of sparkles, and the mage and fighter ran around, beat people up, then retreated back to the 'base' for healing before repeating.
The comps can't seem to handle anything other than walking against the side walls of the map. Sure they respond to "YO!" but only for a few seconds.

Hire a small team. Try and get them controlled by humans. Or play on an easy dif. and get no exp. thats' about it.

-----Original Message-----
> DOes anybody have an idea of the best order to buy your team if you 
> should buy all of it right away or buy it little buy little
> 
> Peter NEvill
